fileheader.author: Aeromatic / Brent Hugh
fileheader.description: Sopwith Camel with Weapons, matches available data for climb, max speed, general handling

function.name: aero/function/velocity-induced-fps
function.description: velocity including the propulsion induced velocity.

function.name: aero/function/qbar-induced-psf
function.description: q bar including the propulsion induced velocity.

function.name: aero/force/Drag_left_aileron
function.description: Drag due to Left Aileron Deflection

function.name: aero/force/Drag_right_aileron
function.description: Drag due to Right Aileron Deflection

function.name: aero/force/Drag_asymmetric_stall
function.description: Drag due to one wing stalling before the other

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_moment_prop_torque_jsbsim_correction
function.description: This reverses the roll moment of the propeller, which we have reversed to compensate for the reversed sense of the gyroscopic moment in JSBSim

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_damp_rotation
function.description: Roll moment (damping) due to roll rate

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_yaw
function.description: Roll moment due to yaw rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_damp_rotation
function.description: Pitch moment due to pitch rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_damp_lift
function.description: Pitch moment due to pitch rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_alphadot
function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_burble
function.description: Pitch moment due to burble at high speeds

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_damp
function.description: Yaw moment due to yaw rate
